item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 4, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

22. The Evolution of SRE at Google (173 points | 79 comments)

26. Can LLMs write better code if you keep asking them to “write better code”? (644 points | 372 comments)
27. Show HN: A remake of my 2004 PDA video game (79 points | 14 comments)
28. Show HN: Org-Supertag (86 points | 47 comments)
29. Why Canada Should Join the EU (218 points | 520 comments)
